thread.title: ‘Wide plunging necklines’ at the #GoldenGlobes have Sally Kohn contemplating changes to her wardrobe
thread.title_full: ‘Wide plunging necklines’ at the #GoldenGlobes have Sally Kohn contemplating changes to her wardrobe

author: Greg P.
title: ‘Wide plunging necklines’ at the #GoldenGlobes have Sally Kohn contemplating changes to her wardrobe
text:
— THE FASHION LAW (@TheFashionLaw) January 9, 2017 . @PriyankaChopra arrives at The @GoldenGlobes in a Ralph Lauren Collection gold, one-of-a-kind hand-embroidered evening dress. #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/7wkA0yk2E3 
— Ralph Lauren (@RalphLauren) January 9, 2017 Busy Philipps is having fun on the #GoldenGlobes red carpet! Come join and watch it all LIVE at https://t.co/XSFLtnDaUi pic.twitter.com/wtX9y3FIsD
